The Trainers

The Trainers arrived at their base. He gave some orders.

"Ignatius, take that bot inside and repair him. We've got big plans."

"What are we going to do boss? Give him the chip?"

"Only if absolutly neccesary. I'd rather have more fun torturing him 
for information. And have his girl Spears' here administer it. That 
would surely crush his spirit. And don't forget to remove all 
weapons, and deactivate his jet pack. I don't want any surprises."

"You got it!"

Ignatius enters the base with Striker. The others also go in, back to 
their stations. Prebon gets off Savage and looks at Spears.

"Come. Let me show you to your room. Savage, you can go wander the 
forest, but be ready for my call."
